All Classes

  • Class Description
    ActionBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of an action block.
    AssessableBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of an assessable block.
    Block
    The abstract class for the concept of a program block.
    BlockAddedEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been added to the domain.
    BlockChangeEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been changed in the domain.
    BlockController
    The BlockController orchestrates Create, Update, Delete and Retrieve operations for Blocks.
    BlockFactory
    The BlockFactory is responsible for the creation of blocks.
    BlockIDGenerator
    The BlockIDGenerator creates unique identifiers for blocks.
    BlockRemovedEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been removed from the domain.
    BlockRepository
    The BlockRepository performs Create, Update, Delete and Retrieve operations for Blocks.
    BlockType
    The types of possible blocks in the domain.
    CanvasWindow  
    ConditionBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of a condition block.
    ConnectionType
    The types of possible connections in the domain.
    ControlBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of a control block.
    DomainController
    The DomainController performs initial checks on the parameters and forwards the requests to the relevant controller.
    DomainListener
    A DomainListener is a listener that's able to update the domain and implements actions corresponding to events emerging from the domain.
    DomainSubject
    A DomainSubject maintains it's list of DomainListeners and fires the DomainEvents.
    Element  
    ElementAddedEvent
    The event thrown when an element has been added to the domain.
    ElementController  
    ElementFactory  
    ElementRepository  
    ElementType  
    EventObject
    This interface servers as a Group for all eventObjects.
    EventTaglet
    EventTaglet is used to create the event tags in the javadoc.
    ExecutableBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of an Executable block.
    GameArea  
    GameController  
    GameState  
    Goal  
    GUIListener
    A GUIlistener resides in the GUI layer and updates the GUI according to events emerging from the domain.
    GUISubject
    A GUISubject maintains it's list of GUIListeners and fires the DomainEvents.
    IfBlock
    The concrete class for the concept of an if block.
    InExecutionState  
    InvalidBlockConnectionException
    This exception is thrown when an operation took place that caused 2 blocks to try to connect while that isn't possible.
    InvalidBlockTypeException
    This exception is thrown when an operation took place that needed a block of a certain type but retrieved a block of another type.
    InValidProgramState  
    MaxNbOfBlocksReachedException
    This exception is thrown when an addBlock operation is tried when the maxNbOfBlocks is already met.
    MoveForwardBlock
    The concrete class for the concept of a moveForward block.
    NoSuchConnectedBlockException
    This exception is thrown when an operation needs a block and the given BlockId isn't preset in the domain.
    NotBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of a Not block.
    OperatorBlock
    The concrete class for the concept of an operator block.
    Orientation  
    PaletteArea  
    PanelChangeEvent
    The event thrown when a panelChange is requested.
    ProgramArea  
    ResetExecutionEvent
    The event thrown when the execution needs to be reset.
    ResettingState  
    Robot  
    RobotAddedEvent
    The event thrown when the robot has been added to the domain.
    RobotChangeEvent
    The event thrown when the robot has been changed in the domain.
    SolidElement  
    TurnLeftBlock
    The concrete class for the concept of a TurnLeft block.
    TurnRightBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of a turn right block.
    UnaryOperatorBlock
    The abstract class for the concept of a unary operator block.
    UpdateGameStateEvent
    The event thrown when the GameState needs to be updated.
    UpdateHighlightingEvent
    The event thrown when a new block needs to be highlighted in the GUI.
    ValidProgramState  
    Wall  
    WallInFrontBlock
    The concrete class for the concept of a WallInFront block.
    WhileBlock
    The concrete class for the concept of a while block.
